Translations.Text: khashiʿatan absaruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kanu yud'ʿawna ila l-sujudi wahum salimuna
fadharni waman yukadhibu bihadha l-hadithi sanastadrijuhum min haythu la yaʿlamuna
am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qaluna
fa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika wala takun kasahibi l-huti idh nada wahuwa makzumun
lawla an tadarakahu niʿ'matun min rabbihi lanubidha bil-ʿarai wahuwa madhmumun
wa-in yakadu alladhina kafaru layuz'liqunaka bi-absarihim lamma samiʿu l-dhik'ra wayaquluna innahu lamajnunun
wa-amma ʿadun fa-uh'liku birihin sarsarin ʿatiyatin
sakharaha ʿalayhim sabʿa layalin wathamaniyata ayyamin husuman fatara l-qawma fiha sarʿa ka-annahum aʿjazu nakhlin khawiyatin
